mapper.select:
SELECT count(cl.lst_id) FROM cst_lost cl INNER JOIN cst_customer cc ON cc.cust_no=cl.lst_cust_no INNER JOIN `sys_user` su ON su.usr_id=cl.lst_cust_manager_id INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM `bas_dict` WHERE dict_type='lst_status') bd ON bd.dict_value=cl.lst_status
and cc.cust_name like concat('%',#{clvo.custname},'%') and su.usr_name like concat('%',#{clvo.managename},'%') and cl.lst_status = #{clvo.lststatus}
